```{r Question 2}
q2_data = read.table("boxoffice.txt", header=TRUE)
q2_data$years_past_1975 = q2_data$year - 1975
View(q2_data)
```

```{r Question 2}
model = lm(
  `GrossBoxOffice` ~
  `year`,
  I(`year`^2),
  I(`year`^3),
  data = q2_data
)
```


```{r}
summary(model)
plot(model)
avPlots(model)
vif(model)
```
